restrict_yoneda_hom_equiv_natural:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⥤ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵒᵖ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/-
Copyright (c) 2020 Bhavik Mehta. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Bhavik Mehta
-/
/-- (Implementation). Show that the bijection in `restrict_yoneda_hom_equiv` is natural (on the right).
-/
theorem restrict_yoneda_hom_equiv_natural (P : «expr ⥤ » («expr ᵒᵖ» C) (Type u₁)) (E₁ E₂ : ℰ) (g : «expr ⟶ » E₁ E₂)
    {c : cocone _} (t : is_colimit c) (k : «expr ⟶ » c.X E₁) :
    restrict_yoneda_hom_equiv A P E₂ t («expr ≫ » k g) =
      «expr ≫ » (restrict_yoneda_hom_equiv A P E₁ t k) ((restricted_yoneda A).map g) :=
  by
  ext (_ X p)
  apply (assoc _ _ _).symm
#align restrict_yoneda_hom_equiv_natural restrict_yoneda_hom_equiv_natural
extend_along_yoneda_obj:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⥤ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵒᵖ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⋙ » -/
@[simp]
theorem extend_along_yoneda_obj (P : «expr ⥤ » («expr ᵒᵖ» C) (Type u₁)) :
    (extend_along_yoneda A).obj P = colimit («expr ⋙ » (category_of_elements.π P).left_op A) :=
  rfl
#align extend_along_yoneda_obj extend_along_yoneda_obj
extend_along_yoneda_map:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⋙ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⥤ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵒᵖ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⋙ » -/
theorem extend_along_yoneda_map {X Y : «expr ⥤ » («expr ᵒᵖ» C) (Type u₁)} (f : «expr ⟶ » X Y) :
    (extend_along_yoneda A).map f =
      colimit.pre («expr ⋙ » (category_of_elements.π Y).left_op A) (category_of_elements.map f).op :=
  by
  ext J
  erw [colimit.ι_pre («expr ⋙ » (category_of_elements.π Y).left_op A) (category_of_elements.map f).op]
  dsimp only [extend_along_yoneda, restrict_yoneda_hom_equiv, is_colimit.hom_iso', is_colimit.hom_iso, ulift_trivial]
  simpa
#align extend_along_yoneda_map extend_along_yoneda_map
cocone_of_representable_ι_app:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⥤ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵒᵖ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵒᵖ» -/
-- Marking this as a simp lemma seems to make things more awkward.
/-- An explicit formula for the legs of the cocone `cocone_of_representable`. -/
theorem cocone_of_representable_ι_app (P : «expr ⥤ » («expr ᵒᵖ» C) (Type u₁)) (j : «expr ᵒᵖ» P.elements) :
    (cocone_of_representable P).ι.app j = (yoneda_sections_small _ _).inv j.unop.2 :=
  colimit.ι_desc _ _
#align cocone_of_representable_ι_app cocone_of_representable_ι_app
cocone_of_representable_naturality:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⥤ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵒᵖ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵒᵖ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/-- The legs of the cocone `cocone_of_representable` are natural in the choice of presheaf. -/
theorem cocone_of_representable_naturality {P₁ P₂ : «expr ⥤ » («expr ᵒᵖ» C) (Type u₁)} (α : «expr ⟶ » P₁ P₂)
    (j : «expr ᵒᵖ» P₁.elements) :
    «expr ≫ » ((cocone_of_representable P₁).ι.app j) α =
      (cocone_of_representable P₂).ι.app ((category_of_elements.map α).op.obj j) :=
  by
  ext (T f)
  simpa [cocone_of_representable_ι_app] using functor_to_types.naturality _ _ α f.op _
#align cocone_of_representable_naturality cocone_of_representable_naturality
cocone_of_representable_X:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⥤ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵒᵖ» -/
-- Maybe this should be reducible or an abbreviation?
@[simp]
theorem cocone_of_representable_X (P : «expr ⥤ » («expr ᵒᵖ» C) (Type u₁)) : (cocone_of_representable P).X = P :=
  rfl
#align cocone_of_representable_X cocone_of_representable_X
